Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at Stony Island/63rd
ShortDescription: Due to street blockage at 63rd Street Beach , 63 63rd buses will only provide service to Stony Island/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to street blockage at 63rd Street Beach , #63 63rd buses will only provide service to Stony Island/63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 31st/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: EB 35 31st/35th buses are temp. rerouted via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd Pl, Cottage Grove, and into 35th as a terminal, due to street blockage near 31st/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Rhodes, 33rd Pl, Cottage Grove, and into 35th as a terminal, due to street blockage near 31st/Cottage Grove.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute at Columbus/McFetridge
ShortDescription: 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Expr buses are temp. rerouted via Columbus, 18th, Solidarity Dr and Planetarium, due to street blockage near Columbus/McFetridge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Columbus, 18th, Solidarity Drive and continue to Planetarium, due to street blockage near Columbus/McFetridge.

Allow extra travel time.
